sentences.en: He has tried to help this child materially and spiritually.
sentences.cn: 他已经尽力在物质和精神上帮助这个孩子了。

sentences.en: Our whole programme is spiritually oriented but not religious.
sentences.cn: 我们的整个节目以精神而不是宗教为导向。

sentences.en: We can talk about "religion-ex" since everybody is spiritually equal, but women and men actually in practice are not equal.
sentences.cn: 我们可以说说“宗教性别”，因为在精神层面上，人人都是平等的，但实际上女人和男人是不平等的。
